amendment.description: Amendment makes technical changes to title I--National Science Foundation, title IV--National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration, and title VII--Federal Aviation Administration.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to delete certain provisions of the bill relating to the National Ocean Service, NOAA, and the FAA, over which there were shared jurisdictional authority with other House Committees.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walker amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
